spec_data.Name: perl-Net-CIDR
spec_data.Description:
The Net::CIDR package contains functions that manipulate lists of IP
netblocks expressed in CIDR notation. The Net::CIDR functions handle both
IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:09:09 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Manipulate IPv4/IPv6 netblocks in CIDR notation
